Shai Hope, the captain of West Indies, reflected on the disappointing performance and emphasized the need to bat better in the Powerplay and play spin better.
Charith Asalanka, the Sri Lankan skipper, expressed that the series win was huge and the team deserved it. He also mentioned the importance of his role batting at number 5.
Maheesh Theekshana mentioned that he got to play because of the rain and felt lucky. He also discussed the difficulty of playing with the new ball and the ease as the ball gets older.
